de.affect.gui

Class DesktopHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.affect.gui.DesktopHelper

  • public class DesktopHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    The class DesktopHelper keeps track of which windows are displayed. It provides methods for positioning new windows on the desktop.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Patrick Gebhard
